channel.title: CVE Feed for Apache Software Foundation -- Apache Linkis Spark EngineConn
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Apache Software Foundation -- Apache Linkis Spark EngineConn

item.title: CVE-2024-39928|2024-09-24T13:30:21.385Z -- apache%20software%20foundation -- apache%20linkis%20spark%20engineconn
item.description: In Apache Linkis <= 1.5.0, a Random string security vulnerability in Spark EngineConn, random string generated by the Token when starting Py4j uses the Commons Lang's RandomStringUtils. Users are recommended to upgrade to version 1.6.0, which fixes this issue.

item.title: CVE-2024-39928|2024-09-24T07:27:55.376Z -- apache%20software%20foundation -- apache%20linkis%20spark%20engineconn
item.description: In Apache Linkis <= 1.5.0, a Random string security vulnerability in Spark EngineConn, random string generated by the Token when starting Py4j uses the Commons Lang's RandomStringUtils. Users are recommended to upgrade to version 1.6.0, which fixes this issue.
